feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:13 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 8:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Temperature: -4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: ESE 12 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets mixed with freezing rain this morning and ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
